# We're crowdfunding!

To make the game available in Tasmania and worldwide and to run our engagement activities we have launched a **crowdfunding** campaign. Currently the game is not available for sale and you can only get it through our [Kickstarter](https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/bigfishcardgame/big-fish-the-tasmanian-fishing-and-ocean-card-game) campaign. 

**This is a non-profit campaign**. 
By pledging to this campaign you will secure your copy of the game and support education and engagement activities on marine science and sustainable recreational fishing. 

The campaign launched on September 15, 2024 and will end on **October 15, 2024**. You can follow along on Kickstarter and be notified of changes and updates to the game.
